EditTextPreference.android:title: Change Insurance Number
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The phone number to send the SMSes to.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Change Start Message
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The message which will be sent when toggling on the insurance.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Change Stop Message
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The message which will be sent when toggling off the insurance.
